title: Day 144 (Psalm 108-110) - Year 2

description:
SHOW NOTES: 

- All the info you need to START is on our website! Seriously, go there.

- Join our PATREON community for bonus perks!

- Get your TBR merch

- Show credits

 

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- Psalm 57

- Psalm 60

- Episode 016 - The Bible Recap

- Hebrews 4:14-5:10

- Hebrews 6:13-8:13

- Sign up to receive the Organizational Tools PDF*

*Email will be sent out on the last day of each month

 

SOCIALS:

D-GROUP: The Bible Recap is brought to you by D-Group - an international network of discipleship and accountability groups that meet weekly in homes and churches: Find or start one near you today!
